sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content:
Error.Halt is a procedure that immediately halts execution of the program and shows the specified error message on the line in the program that calls Error.Halt.

This procedure is useful for allowing a quick halt to a program while indicating an error condition.

sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Error.Halt, not by calling Halt.
